body.name: Musical Instrument Microphone Dynamic Singing Microphone with XLR Cable 12 Feet Portable Microphone for Karaoke, Speech, Wedding, Stage and Outdoor Activities
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 26 mins
features: Support a variety of devices: fully support a variety of devices, such as DVD, KTV audio, reverb, mixer, tour bus, etc.; can be installed on any standard microphone stand (using a microphone clip - not included).

Widely used: suitable for professional KTV, stage performances, business meetings, family or friends gatherings, outdoor performances, etc. Especially suitable for instrument recording, live musical performances, public speaking, podcasts, recording sessions and more
This product uses a magnetic switch to effectively reduce the impact sound when the microphone is turned on/off, effectively protecting the speaker unit.
Easy to connect and use with included single male XLR cable and simple on/off switch(Professional grade 11.40 ft（3.5M）. XLR-to-1/4” cable supplied).
Super cardioid pick up pattern and built-in spherical wind and pop filter for separating background noise and delivering clear sound
body.description: Tailored microphone cartridge design specifically for clarity in the standard frequency range of speech Cardioid polar pattern picks up audio from the source while rejecting unwanted noise Updated industrial design with black finish and grille featuring classic silver ball grille On/Off switch for discrete control of microphone operation Contains 1Xmicrophone 1X(Professional grade 11.40 ft（3.5M）XLR-to-1/4” cable supplied). --------------------------------------------

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The mic works really really well it's very loud you can plug it into like a guitar Port it has a three circle hole it's very good like all the other reviews I see is you know wires being broke packaging being horrible but mine and all the other ones are all five stars this is really good I think you should buy it I mean I got it and it like it lets you be heard and it's way better than what you pay for it's $6.99 but this Mike honestly maybe $6.99 but it acts like it's what it's a million dollars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This wasn't worth the money you pay. After trying it out. You couldn't barely hear anything coming from the mic. You have to cup your hand around the mic to be able to hear anything. Even after cupping the mic you still couldn't hear much at all. Not even using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: This microphone In my opinion is better than what you pay for it. The sound is clear and loud. The mic itself isn’t too light but not real heavy either. The cord is also a nice longer length. Makes a great mic for a karaoke night. I ended up ordering 2 of them. I will definitely order again if I need another.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Description is Misleading, Product Came Pre-used
reviews.reviewText: I'm not even sure where to start. This is the first negative review I have ever left on a product. Here goes:I opened the still-sealed package to find the product box was not closed at all and was damaged, possibly from being shipped that way. The contents were just shoved in haphazardly, the wires were crammed in without any care, even though the twist tie was right there, and it would have taken seconds to loop and tie the wire and ship it the right way. I can't imagine shipping something off in this condition to a customer. The microphone itself has chips and scuffs in the paint and was definitely well-used before being returned by the last person.All this was definitely frustrating, but I could have forgiven it if the microphone sounded good. But I won't know if it works for a while. The product description has a giant "3.5M" in it, which lead me to think that the plug and wire were for a 3.5M jack with an 11-foot long 1/4" cord. It's not, this plug is gigantic, and I will need to purchase an adapter before I can use it. I will take the blame for not reading better, but it definitely feels sleezy to me, the way the product description is worded, since 3.5M is a pretty universal and well-used jack size for microphones.After I see if this microphone actually works, I will come back and update the review. I'm not going to hold my breath and I'm not going to bother returning it because I don't have time to fiddle with it. I'll just buy an adapter. So far, I would not recommend, based on this experience :(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought to use for karaoke, great item easy to use and a long lead.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: When it came it rattled inside so I took it apart to find that the main component to pick up the sound had come loose. A strong push into it's slot is all it took to fix. It looks cheap and nasty and I suppose it is, but, I wanted a mic to plug into an amp to do the announcements on Karaoke in between singers/songs and it works excellently for this. Clear speech and picks up just my voice - absolutely brilliant for what I wanted it for. Have not tried to sing into it, so cannot comment further
